const _PlayerStartRow=1
const _ResourceCol = 16 const _ResNameRow = 1 const _ResTrackRow = 18 const _ResTrackReducedRow = 19
const _NukeCol = 2 const _NukeRow = 19
const _PlayerCol = 1 ' player name (bgg id) const _PlayerNameCol = 4 ' character name const _PlayerLoyaltyCol = _PlayerNameCol + 1 const _PlayerPresCol = _PlayerNameCol + 2 const _PlayerAdmCol = _PlayerNameCol + 3 const _PlayerCAGCol = _PlayerNameCol + 4 const _PlayerViperCol = _PlayerNameCol + 5 const _PlayerOPGCol = _PlayerNameCol + 6 const _PlayerCylonCol = _PlayerNameCol + 7 const _PlayerSuperCol = _PlayerNameCol + 8 const _PlayerLocCol = _PlayerNameCol + 9 const _PlayerEmailCol = _PlayerNameCol - 3 const _PlayerInfiltrateCol = _PlayerNameCol - 1
const _TurnRow = 0 const _TurnCol = 11

const _JumpPrepCol = 15 const _JumpPrepRow = 27
const _PursuitCol = 15 const _PursuitRow = 35

const _GamePhaseTextCol = 13 const _GamePhaseTextRow = 26

sub GetGS if GameSheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
GameSheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Game State") GameForm = GameSheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formGameState")
Randomize end sub
sub PopulatePlayers dim playerlst(8) as string dim i as integer
GetGS GetSF GetIonNeb GetMutinySheet
for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() playerlst(i) = GetPlayerName(i) next i GameForm.getByName("lstPlayers").StringItemList = playerlst() SkillForm.getByName("lstPlayers").StringItemList = playerlst() IonNebForm.getByName("lstPlayers").StringItemList = playerlst() MutinyForm.getByName("lstPlayers").StringItemList = playerlst()
SetPlayerSelect 1 end sub
' Populate the location list based on the player, phase of the game, and current location ' Possible permutations: ' PlayerType = Human (& unrevealed cylon), Revealed Cylon, Leader, Sympathetic ' Phases = _PhaseInSpace, _PhaseOnNewCaprica,_PhaseGalacticaReturns
sub UpdateLocations dim loclst() as string dim playerID as integer dim playername as string dim isfirst as boolean dim tmpidx, locidx, cursector as integer dim LocGal(), LocC1(), LocPeg(), LocNC(), LocCylon(), LocDem(), LocRBBDay(), LocRBBRev(), LocColony() as string GetGS
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if playerID = GetSelected(_ListGamePlayers) playername = GetPlayerName (playerID) locidx = 1 isfirst = TRUE
LocGal = Array("Admiral's Quarters","Armory","Brig","Command","Communications","FTL Control","Hangar Deck","Research Lab","Sickbay","Weapons Control") LocC1 = Array("Administration","President's Office","Press Room") LocPeg = Array("Pegasus CIC","Airlock","Main Batteries","Engine Room") LocNC = Array("Resistance HQ","Occupation Authority","Breeder's Canyon","Shipyard","Medical Center","Detention") LocCylon = Array("Caprica","Cylon Fleet","Human Fleet","Resurrection Ship") LocDem = Array("Bridge","Tactical Plot","Captain's Cabin") LocRBBDay = Array("Hybrid Tank","Datastream","Raider Bay") LocRBBRev = Array("Missile Batteries","Rebel Hybrid","Basestar Control","Meditation Chamber") LocColony = Array("The Opera House","Colony Turret","Communication Node","Colony Defenses","Cylon Command") ' Treat the Assault Track the way we treat Space Areas.
' For Revealed Cylon OR CylonLeader/Symp ' if _PhaseInSpace OR _PhaseGalacticaReturns ' Cylon Locations ' end if
'IsRevealed includes cylon leaders and sympathetic cylons if IsRevealed(playerID) and not IsInfiltrating(playerID) then 'or IsSympathetic(playerID) or IsCylonLeader(playerID) then if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then if UseCylonFleet() then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "Basestar Bridge" locidx = locidx + 1 end if
if HubDestroyed() then LocCylon(3) = "Hub Destroyed" end if
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locCylon) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locCylon(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx
if DRBBAllegiance() = "Cylon" then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locRBBDay) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locRBBDay(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx end if isfirst = FALSE end if end if
if (Not IsRevealed(playerID)) or isInfiltrating(playerID) then if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then ' deal with pilots here.... if IsPilot(playername) and Not (IsRevealed(playerID) and Not isInfiltrating(playerID)) then if IsSpaceLoc(GetPlayerLoc(playerID)) then cursector = val(right(GetPlayerLoc(playerID), 2)) if GetPlayerViper(playerID) > 10 and GetPlayerViper(playerID) < 20 then 'Mark VII redim preserve loclst(4) as string loclst(1) = "Sector " & MoveDown(MoveDown(cursector)) loclst(2) = "Sector " & MoveDown(cursector) loclst(3) = "Sector " & MoveUp(cursector) loclst(4) = "Sector " & MoveUp(MoveUp(cursector)) locidx = 5 else redim preserve loclst(2) as string loclst(1) = "Sector " & MoveDown(cursector) loclst(2) = "Sector " & MoveUp(cursector) locidx = 3 end if
if playername <> "Hot Dog" and GetPlayerViper(playerID) < 20 then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "Damage Viper" locidx = locidx + 1 end if
redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string if GetPlayerViper(playerID) > 20 then loclst(locidx) = "Destroy Raptor" else loclst(locidx) = "Destroy Viper" end if locidx = locidx + 1 else redim preserve loclst(2) as string loclst(1) = "Sector 5" loclst(2) = "Sector 6" locidx = 3 end if isFirst = FALSE end if
if not isFirst then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1 end if
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locGal) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locGal(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx
if PegasusAvailable() then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1 for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locPeg) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locPeg(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx end if
if ColonialOneAvailable() then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1
if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "Quorum Chamber" locidx = locidx + 1 end if
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locC1) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locC1(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx end if
if ObjectiveIsEarth() then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locDem) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locDem(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx
if DRBBAllegiance() = "Human" then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locRBBDay) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locRBBDay(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx end if end if isfirst = FALSE end if end if
if IsGamePhase(_PhaseOnNewCaprica) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then if not isFirst then redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = "---------------" locidx = locidx + 1 end if
for tmpidx = 0 to ubound(locNC) redim preserve loclst(locidx) as string loclst(locidx) = locNC(tmpidx) locidx = locidx + 1 next tmpidx end if
GameForm.getByName("lstLocations").StringItemList = g_emptylst() GameForm.getByName("lstLocations").StringItemList = loclst() ConfigureButtons GameForm.getByName("btnMovePlayer").enabled = FALSE end sub 'UpdateLocations
sub EnableMoveBtn GetGS GameForm.getByName("btnMovePlayer").enabled = TRUE end sub
' Sets the player's userid sub SetPlayer (playerid as integer, player as string) GetGS
GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = player end sub
' Sets the player's name (character) sub SetPlayerName(playerid as integer, playername as string) GetGS
GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerNameCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = playername end sub
function GetPlayerName (playerID as integer) as string GetGS if playerID = 0 or playerID = _DestinyPlayerID then GetPlayerName = "Destiny" elseif playerID = _SkillCheckPlayerID then GetPlayerName = "Skill Check" else GetPlayerName = GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerNameCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String end if end function
function GetPlayerID (playername as string) as integer dim playerID as integer GetGS GetPlayerID = 0 for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() if GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerNameCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = playername then GetPlayerID = PlayerID exit for end if next playerID end function
function GetPlayerLoc (playerID as integer) as string GetGS GetPlayerLoc = GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerLocCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String end function
function IsSick (playerID as integer) as boolean IsSick = (GetPlayerLoc(playerID) = "Sickbay" OR GetPlayerLoc(playerID) = "Medical Center") end function
'IsRevealed applies to a revealed cylon, a Cylon Leader (infiltrating or not), or a Human Sympathizer function IsRevealed (playerID as integer) as boolean GetGS IsRevealed = (GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerCylonCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String <> "") end function
sub SetRevealed (playerID as integer, optional clear as boolean) if IsMissing(clear) then clear=FALSE end if
if clear then GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerCylonCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = "" else GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerCylonCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = "X" end if end sub
function IsInfiltrating (playerID as integer) as boolean GetGS IsInfiltrating = (GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerInfiltrateCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = "X") end function
sub SetInfiltrate (playerID as integer, infflag as boolean) if infflag then GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerInfiltrateCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = "X" else GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerInfiltrateCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String = "" end if end sub
function IsCylon (playerID as integer) as boolean GetGS
IsCylon = (GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerLoyaltyCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).String <> "H") end function
function GetSuperCnt (playerID as integer) as integer GetGS
GetSuperCnt = GameSheet.getCellByPosition(_PlayerSuperCol, _PlayerStartRow + playerID).value end function
function IsCylonLeaderByName (playername as string) as boolean IsCylonLeaderByName = (playername = "Cavil" or playername = "Leoben" or playername = "D'Anna" or playername = "Simon" or playername = "Doral" or playername = "Six" or playername = "Athena") end function
function IsCylonLeader (playerid as integer) as boolean IsCylonLeader = IsCylonLeaderByName(GetPlayerName(playerID)) end function
function IsPilot (plyrname as string) as boolean if plyrname = "Apollo" or plyrname = "Lee" or plyrname = "Starbuck" or plyrname = "Kat" or plyrname = "Hot Dog" or plyrname = "Boomer" or plyrname = "Racetrack" or plyrname = "Anders" or plyrname = "Helo" or plyrname = "Karl" or plyrname = "Seelix" or plyrname = "Athena" then IsPilot = TRUE else IsPilot = FALSE end if end function
function IsSpaceLoc (locstr as string) as boolean IsSpaceLoc = (left(locstr,6) = "Sector") end function
function IsCylonLoc (locstr as string) as boolean IsCylonLoc = (locstr = "Caprica" or locstr = "Cylon Fleet" or locstr = "Human Fleet" or locstr = "Resurrection Ship" or locstr = "Basestar Bridge" or locstr = "Hub Destroyed") end function
function IsGalacticaLoc (locstr as string) as boolean IsGalacticaLoc = (locstr = "FTL Control" or locstr = "Weapons Control" or locstr = "Command" or locstr = "Communications" or locstr = "Admiral's Quarters" or locstr = "Research Lab" or locstr = "Hangar Deck" or locstr = "Armory" or locstr = "Sickbay" or locstr = "Brig") end function
function IsPegasusLoc (locstr as string) as boolean IsPegasusLoc = (locstr = "Pegasus CIC" or locstr = "Airlock" or locstr = "Main Batteries" or locstr = "Engine Room") end function
function IsColonialOneLoc (locstr as string) as boolean IsColonialOneLoc = (locstr = "Press Room" or locstr = "President's Office" or locstr = "Administration" or locstr = "Quorum Chamber") end function
function IsHazardous (locstr as string) as boolean IsHazardous = (locstr = "Sickbay" or locstr = "Brig" or locstr = "Resurrection Ship" or locstr = "Hub Destroyed" or locstr = "Medical Center" or locstr = "Detention") end function
sub SetPlayerLoc (playerid as integer, locstr as string) dim prevloc, admID as string dim wasSick as boolean GetGS
wasSick = IsSick(playerID)
prevloc = GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerLocCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).string GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PlayerLocCol,_PlayerStartRow + playerID).string = locstr
if locstr = "Brig" and prevloc <> "Brig" then if GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral) = playerID then ' if the admiral was just brigged, we need to change the admiral admID = GetNextTitle(_TitleAdmiral) MsgBox "The Admiral has been brigged!" & chr(13) & GetPlayerName(admID) & " is now the Admiral" UpdateTitle admID, _TitleAdmiral LogThis GetPlayerName(admID) & " is now the Admiral!" end if if GetTitle(_TitleCAG) = playerID then admID = GetNextTitle(_TitleCAG) MsgBox "The CAG has been brigged!" & chr(13) & GetPlayerName(admID) & " is now the CAG" UpdateTitle admID, _TitleCAG LogThis GetPlayerName(admID) & " is now the CAG!" end if end if
if ObjectiveIsIonianNebula and GetCurrentPlayer() = playerID then EncounterLocationAllies(locstr) end if
Board_RefreshPlayerLoc Board_RefreshPlayerAssignments UpdateLocations end sub
sub SetGamePhase (newphase as integer) GetGS dim phases() as string
phases = Array (,"IN SPACE","ON NEW CAPRICA","GALACTICA RETURNS") GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_GamePhaseCol,_GamePhaseRow).value = newphase GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_GamePhaseTextCol,_GamePhaseTextRow).string = phases(newphase) UpdateShipTypeList end sub
function IsGamePhase (whichphase as integer) as boolean GetGS
IsGamePhase = (GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_GamePhaseCol,_GamePhaseRow).value = whichphase) end function
function OnNewCaprica as boolean OnNewCaprica = (IsGamePhase(_PhaseOnNewCaprica) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns)) end function
sub NextTurn dim curmaj,curmin as integer dim i, rtncd, playerid, cntr as integer dim tmploc as string
GetGS
if Not IsSkillCheckClear() then MsgBox "Please clear the skill check before you advance the turn." exit sub end if
rtncd = MsgBox ("Advance the Turn?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
' add in checks for hand size for playerid = 1 to PlayerCnt() if HandCardCnt(playerid) > 10 or (HandCardCnt(playerID) > 8 and GetPlayerName(PlayerID) = "Chief" and not IsRevealed(playerID)) then rtncd = MsgBox (GetPlayerName(PlayerID) & " is over the hand limit and must discard, do you want to end the turn anyway?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if elseif GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Tigh" and HandCardCnt(playerID) = 1 and not IsRevealed(playerID) then MsgBox "Tigh has only one card in his hand and will discard it due to alcholism." LogThis "Tigh is an alcoholic." RemoveFromHand playerID, 1, FALSE end if next playerid
if Not CheckQrmHandLimit then rtncd = MsgBox (GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitlePresident)) & " is over the Quorum hand limit and must discard, do you want to end the turn anyway?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if
curmaj=GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol,_TurnRow).value curmin=GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol+1,_TurnRow).value
if GetCrisisFlag (FALSE) = TRUE then rtncd = MsgBox ("Did you activate cylon ships per the crisis?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if if GetCrisisFlag (TRUE) = TRUE then rtncd = MsgBox ("You did not advance the Jump Track per the crisis, do you still want to procede?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if
if not IsRevealed(curmin) then if GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Boomer" then rtncd = MsgBox ("Did Boomer do her Recon ability?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if elseif GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Baltar" then rtncd = MsgBox ("Did Baltar get his extra resource card for his Delusional Intuition?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if elseif GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Kat" and (GetPlayerLoc(curmin) <> "Brig" and GetPlayerLoc(curmin) <> "Detention") then if GetPlayerLoc(curmin) = GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_KatLocCol, _KatLocRow).string then if IsGamePhase(_PhaseOnNewCaprica) then tmploc = "Medical Center" else tmploc = "Sickbay" end if MsgBox "Kat did not move this turn and is being sent to " & tmploc & " since she's a stim junkie" SetPlayerLoc (curmin, tmploc) end if end if end if
' Reset "reduced resource this turn" marker for cntr = _ResourceCol to _ResourceCol+3 GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(cntr, _ResTrackReducedRow).string = "" next cntr
if GameForm.getByName("chkAutoCreate").state = 1 then GenerateBoardImage end if
'+== make saveversion optional, or save the entire file. SaveVersion 'this sets a version checkpoint in the file so we could go back and recover it
if curmin = PlayerCnt() then curmaj = curmaj + 1 curmin=1 else curmin=curmin+1 end if LogThis "************************************"
GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol,_TurnRow).value = curmaj GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol+1,_TurnRow).value = curmin
LogThis "************************************" LogThis "Beginning Round " & curmaj & "." & curmin HighlightCurrentPlayer
if GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Kat" then 'store her current location GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_KatLocCol, _KatLocRow).string = GetPlayerLoc(curmin) end if
Board_SetCurrentPlayer Skills_SetCurrentPlayer ConfigureButtons SetSuperCrisisBtns SetCrisisStartButton ClearCrisisFlags ClearMissionFlag SortHands SetPlayerSelect curmin
' Check if we have to automatically Draw the current player hand or just enable the respective button GetSF SkillForm.getByName("btnDrawCurrentPlayerHand").enabled = FALSE if GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Athena" and IsHazardous(GetPlayerLoc(curmin)) then MsgBox "Athena is Grieving, and draws no cards this turn." elseif GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) = "Hub Destroyed" then MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetCurrentPlayer()) & " starts in the Hub Destroyed Location and must discard their Super Crisis Cards." elseif IsSick(GetCurrentPlayer()) then MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetCurrentPlayer()) & " is in " & GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) & " and only receives 1 card this turn.", 0, "Sickness" elseif GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Doral" and IsInfiltrating(curmin) then MsgBox "Doral is Infiltrating and draws two extra cards instead of one." elseif GetPlayerName(curmin) = "Karl" and not IsGalacticaLoc(GetPlayerLoc(curmin)) then MsgBox "Karl is not on Galactica and draws only 4 cards this turn." else if GameForm.getByName("chkAutoDraw").state = 1 then DrawCurrentPlayerHand else SkillForm.getByName("btnDrawCurrentPlayerHand").enabled = TRUE end if end if
if ObjectiveIsIonianNebula() then if GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) = "Brig" or GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) = "Sickbay" then if MsgBox(GetPlayerName(GetCurrentPlayer()) & " is in " & GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer()) & ", draw the Trauma token there?", 4, "Trauma") = 6 then DrawLocTrauma(GetCurrentPlayer(), GetPlayerLoc(GetCurrentPlayer())) end if end if end if
'set the raw value for the log viewer GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_LogViewCol,_LogViewRow).value = (curmaj -1)*PlayerCnt() + curmin ViewLog end sub 'NextTurn
function GetCurTurn as string GetGS
GetCurTurn = GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol,_TurnRow).value & "." & GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_TurnCol+1,_TurnRow).value end function
Sub MovePlayer dim tmplst() as string dim playerID, locID, rtncd as integer dim plyrname, destname as string dim viperid, mark7ID, assault, sectorid, viperType as integer dim pilotmove as boolean
GetGS
playerID = GetSelected(_ListGamePlayers) if playerID = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a Character to move.",0,"Move Player" exit sub end if
plyrname = GetPlayerName(playerid) locID = GetSelected(_ListGameLocations) if locID = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a valid destination.",0,"Move Player" exit sub end if
destname = GameForm.getByName("lstLocations").StringItemList(locID) if destname = "---------------" then MsgBox "Please select a valid destination.",0,"Move Player" exit sub end if
if destname = "Damage Viper" or destname = "Destroy Viper" or destname = "Destroy Raptor" then rtncd = MsgBox ("Do you really want to " & trim(left(destname, 7)) & " " & plyrname & "'s Viper?", 4, "Move Player") else rtncd = MsgBox ("Move " & plyrname & " to " & destname & "?", 4, "Move Player") end if if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
pilotmove = FALSE 'special check here if it's a pilot...could be moving to or from a viper if IsSpaceLoc(GetPlayerLoc(PlayerID)) or IsSpaceLoc(destname) then '3 options...ship to viper, viper to ship, viper:sector to sector if Not IsSpaceLoc(GetPlayerLoc(playerid)) then ' Check for available ships viperid = GetAvailableShip(_ShipViper) mark7ID = GetAvailableShip(_ShipMarkVII) assault = GetAvailableShip(_ShipAssaultRaptor)
if viperID + mark7ID + assault = 0 then Msgbox "No available ships in the reserves!", 0, "Move Player" exit sub end if
' Assault Raptors if assault > 0 then if viperID + mark7ID = 0 then ' If there are only Assault Raptors rtncd = 6 else rtncd = MsgBox("Launch " & plyrname & " in an Assault Raptor?", 4, "Move Player") endif if rtncd = 6 then SetViperPilot playerID, assault, _ShipAssaultRaptor SetPlayerViper playerID, assault + 20 SetShipStatus _ShipAssaultRaptor, assault, _ShipStatusActivate mark7ID = 0 ' Skip the other ships. viperid = 0 pilotmove = TRUE LogThis plyrname & " LAUNCHED Assault Raptor " & assault & " into " & destname end if end if
' Viper MkVIIs if mark7ID > 0 then if viperID = 0 then ' No normal Vipers left rtncd = 6 else rtncd = MsgBox("Launch " & plyrname & " in a Viper MkVII?", 4, "Move Player") endif if rtncd = 6 then SetViperPilot playerID, mark7ID, _ShipMarkVII SetPlayerViper playerID, mark7ID + 10 SetShipStatus _ShipMarkVII, mark7ID, _ShipStatusActivate viperid = 0 ' Skip the normal Vipers pilotmove = TRUE LogThis plyrname & " LAUNCHED Viper Mark VII " & mark7ID & " into " & destname end if end if
' Vipers if viperID > 0 then SetViperPilot playerID, viperID, _ShipViper SetPlayerViper playerID, viperID SetShipStatus _ShipViper, viperID, _ShipStatusActivate pilotmove = TRUE LogThis plyrname & " LAUNCHED Viper " & ViperID & " into " & destname end if
UpdateShips
elseif IsSpaceLoc(destname) then 'moving from Sector to Sector 'find which viper the pilot is in, move the viper viperID = GetPlayerViper(playerid) if viperID > 20 then LogThis plyrname & " in Assault Raptor " & ViperID - 20 & " moves to " & destname elseif viperID > 10 then LogThis plyrname & " in Viper Mark VII " & ViperID - 10 & " moves to " & destname else LogThis plyrname & " in Viper " & ViperID & " moves to " & destname end if else 'returning to a ship from space 'find which viper the pilot is in, clear pilot's viper, clear viper's pilot, ' return viper to [reserves | damaged | destroyed], if needed, move pilot to Sickbay
viperID = GetPlayerViper(playerid) SetPlayerViper PlayerID, 0 if viperID > 20 then viperType = _ShipAssaultRaptor viperID = viperID - 20 elseif viperID > 10 then viperType = _ShipMarkVII viperID = viperID - 10 else viperType = _ShipViper end if
SetViperPilot 0, ViperID, viperType
if left(destname, 6) = "Damage" then SetShipStatus viperType, ViperID, 7 destname = "Sickbay" LogThis "Viper " & ViperID & " is Damaged. " & plyrname & " moves to Sickbay"
elseif left(destname, 7) = "Destroy" then SetShipStatus viperType, ViperID, 8 destname="Sickbay" LogThis "Viper " & ViperID & " is Destroyed. " & plyrname & " moves to Sickbay" else SetShipStatus viperType, ViperID, 0 LogThis plyrname & " moves to " & destname & " and returns Viper " & ViperID & " to the Reserves" end if UpdateShips
end if else LogThis plyrname & " moved to " & destname end if SetPlayerLoc(playerID, destname) if pilotmove then Board_RefreshVipers end if
SetDrawCards playerID end sub 'MovePlayer
sub MakePresident SetTitle _TitlePresident end sub
sub MakeAdmiral SetTitle _TitleAdmiral end sub
sub MakeCAG SetTitle _TitleCag end sub
sub SetTitle (titleFlag as integer) dim playerID, TitleCol, rtncd, i as integer dim TitleStr as string
select case titleFlag case _TitlePresident TitleStr = "PRESIDENT" case _TitleAdmiral TitleStr = "ADMIRAL" case _TitleCAG TitleStr = "CAG" end select
playerID = GetSelected(_ListGamePlayers) if PlayerID = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a Character to make " & TitleStr exit sub elseif IsRevealed(playerID) then msgBox "Don't be ridiculous, a Revealed Cylon can't be " & TitleStr exit sub else rtncd = MsgBox("Are you sure you want to make " & GetPlayerName(playerID) & " the " & TitleStr,4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if end if
UpdateTitle playerID, titleFlag LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is now the " & TitleStr
end sub 'SetTitle
sub UpdateTitle (playerID as integer, titleflag as integer) dim i, titleCol as integer GetGS
select case titleflag case _TitlePresident titleCol = _PlayerPresCol case _TitleAdmiral titleCol = _PlayerAdmCol case _TitleCAG titleCol = _PlayerCAGCol end select
for i = 1 to 7 if i = playerID then GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(titleCol,_PlayerStartRow + i).string = "X" else GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(titleCol,_PlayerStartRow + i).string = "" end if next i
Board_RefreshPlayerTitles ConfigureButtons end sub 'UpdateTitle
sub SetLoyaltyHuman (playerID as integer) GetGS

sub Execute (playerID as integer) dim rtncd, srcCard, curcard, viperID, i, cardtouse as integer dim newChar, oldChar, loyaltycard, startloc as string dim tmplst() as string dim cardlst as variant dim foundname, flaw as boolean dim namelst as variant GetGS
if (MsgBox ("Do you really want to execute " & GetPlayerName(playerID) & "?",4,"Execution")) <> 6 then exit sub end if
if IsSpaceLoc(GetPlayerLoc(PlayerID)) then 'find which viper the pilot is in, clear pilot's viper, clear viper's pilot, ' return viper to reserves viperID = GetPlayerViper(playerid) SetPlayerViper PlayerID, 0 if viperID < 10 then SetViperPilot 0, ViperID, _ShipViper SetShipStatus _ShipViper, ViperID, 0 LogThis "Viper " & ViperID & " returns to the Reserves" elseif viperID < 20 then viperID = viperID - 10 SetViperPilot 0, ViperID, _ShipMarkVII SetShipStatus _ShipMarkVII, ViperID, 0 LogThis "Viper Mark VII " & ViperID & " returns to the Reserves" else viperID = viperID - 20 SetViperPilot 0, ViperID, _ShipAssaultRaptor SetShipStatus _ShipAssaultRaptor, ViperID, 0 LogThis "Assault Raptor " & ViperID & " returns to the Reserves" end if UpdateShips end if
if not IsCylon(playerID) then oldChar = GetPlayerName(playerID) tmplst = GameForm.getByName("lstExecute").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then MsgBox "Select the name of the character to return as after execution.", 0, "Execution" exit sub end if
' Discard Mutiny Cards and Miracle Tokens if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then MsgBox "Mutiny Discarded." DiscardAllMutiny(playerID) SetOPG(playerID, 0) end if
newChar = GameForm.getByName("lstExecute").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0)) SetPlayerName playerID, newChar if IsGamePhase(_PhaseOnNewCaprica) then ' if we're on new New Caprica, everyone comes back in Medical Center SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Medical Center" else startloc = RefStartLocation(newChar) if Not ColonialOneAvailable() and (startloc = "Administration" or startloc = "President's Office" or startloc = "Press Room") then startloc = "Sickbay" end if SetPlayerLoc playerID, startloc end if
select case newChar case "Baltar" if GetTotalDistance() < 4 then 'not yet sleeper if GameTypeIsExodus() then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) else AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, "You Are Not a Cylon" end if ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty)
MsgBox "Extra Loyalty card added to Loyalty Deck, and one dealt to the new Baltar.",0,"Execution" else ' post sleeper if not GameTypeIsExodus() then SetOPG(playerID, 0) MsgBox "Post sleeper, Baltar's OPG is unavailable",0,"Execution" end if end if
case "Apollo" if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then MsgBox "Apollo is in the Hangar Deck. If a viper is in reserves, launch him in it.",0,"Execution" end if
case "Helo" MsgBox "Helo is stranded on his next turn",0,"Execution"
case "Boomer" 'slightly different rules here... 'Pegasus: If we're pre-sleeper, add an extra "you are not a cylon" to the deck and be done 'Exodus: Add an extra card from "you are not a cylon" to the loyalty deck; ' then if we're post-sleeper, deal an extra loyalty card 'Either: throw in brig/detention if we are post sleeper
if GameTypeIsExodus() then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty MsgBox "Extra card added to the Loyalty deck.",0,"Execution"
elseif GetTotalDistance() < 4 then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, "You Are Not a Cylon" ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty MsgBox "Extra card added to the Loyalty deck.", 0, "Execution" end if
if GetTotalDistance() > 3 then if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticReturns) then SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Brig" else SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Detention" end if If GameTypeIsExodus() then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty) end if end if
case "Cain" if (IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns)) then if PegasusAvailable() then MsgBox "Cain has been placed in Pegasus CIC, move her is she's supposed to be in Command.",0,"Execution" else SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Command" end if end if end select
'discard skill cards do while HandCardCnt(playerid) > 0 RemoveFromHand playerID, 1, FALSE loop MsgBox "Skill Cards discarded.", 0, "Execution" RemoveAssignments playerID
'discard loyalty cards do while DiscardLoyalty(playerID, "*") loop
if VariantFlaws() then flaw = FlawRevealed(playerID) DiscardFlaw(playerID) if (GetTotalDistance < 4) or flaw then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckFlaws), _LoyaltyFlaw if flaw then RevealFlaw(playerID, true) end if end if end if
if GameTypeIsExodus() then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty) end if
if ObjectiveIsIonianNebula() then InactivateAllyPlayer(playerID) DiscardAllTokens(playerID) for i = 1 to 3 UpdatePlayerTTCnt(playerID, GetTTFromPool(TRUE), 1) 'TRUE in the GetTTFromPool call for no disasters next i MsgBox "Old Trauma tokens have been discarded and three new ones drawn." end if
if oldChar = "Dee" and GameSheet.GetCellByPosition(_ResourceCol + 2, _ResTrackRow).value < 3 then MsgBox "Morale remains unaffected",0,"Execution" else ReduceResource(_ResourceMorale) LogThis "Morale REDUCED to " & GetResource(_ResourceMorale) MsgBox "Morale reduced by 1",0,"Execution" UpdateResource end if
if oldChar = "Boomer" and GetTotalDistance() < 4 then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty)
MsgBox "Extra Loyalty card dealt to " & newChar & " as Boomer's successor.",0,"Execution" end if
DumpBody(oldChar) LogThis oldChar & " has been dumped in the graveyard."
if GetTitle(_TitlePresident) = playerID then UpdateTitle GetNextTitle(_TitlePresident), _TitlePresident MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitlePresident)) & " is now the President.",0,"Execution" LogThis GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitlePresident)) & " is now the President." end if if GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral) = playerID then UpdateTitle GetNextTitle(_TitleAdmiral), _TitleAdmiral MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral)) & " is now the Admiral.",0,"Execution" LogThis GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral)) & " is now the Admiral." end if
if IsMutineer(playerID) then ' New character receives the Mutineer card again - after getting the Titles they should have. MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is now the Mutineer." MakeMutineer(playerID) end if
if GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Roslin" and not OPGUsed(playerID) then EnableSP TRUE elseif GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Adama" and not OPGUsed(playerID) then EnableCommandAuthority TRUE end if
SetDrawCards playerID PopulatePlayers ConfigureButtons
else 'cylon is executed do while HandCardCnt(playerid) > 0 RemoveFromHand playerID, 1, FALSE loop MsgBox "Hand discarded",0,"Execution"
if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then MsgBox "Mutiny Discarded." DiscardAllMutiny(playerID) SetOPG(playerID, 0) end if
if IsRevealed(playerID) then 'infiltrating cylon or we're on NC if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Resurrection Ship" LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " moved to Resurrection Ship" else SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Medical Center" LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " moved to Medical Center" end if else
MakeCylon(playerID, TRUE) ' discard ONE "you are a Cylon" loyalty card cardlst = GetCylonCards(playerID) cardtouse = 1 if ubound(cardlst) = 2 then msgstr = GetPlayerName(playerID) & " has 2 'You are a Cylon' loyalty cards." & chr(13) & "Is '" & cardlst(1) & "' the one that is being shown?" rtnCd = MsgBox(msgstr,4,"Execution: Select Loyalty Card to Display") if rtnCd <> 6 then cardtouse=2 end if end if DiscardLoyalty playerID, cardlst(cardtouse)
if VariantFlaws() then DiscardFlaw(playerID) end if end if SetInfiltrate playerID, FALSE 'just in case the cylon was infiltrating end if
end sub 'Execute
